alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Cumberland (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 13 at 9:35AM EDT until March 15 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington NC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina... Cape Fear River At William O Huske Lock And Dam 3 affecting Bladen and Cumberland Counties. For the Cape Fear River...including William O Huske Lock And Dam 3, Elizabethtown, Lock And Dam 1...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cape Fear River At William O Huske Lock And Dam 3. * WHEN...From this evening to Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 45.0 feet, Flood waters will affect lowlands along the east bank of the river with some minor overflow along the west bank. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 39.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 43.8 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 42.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by this evening.
